hero.title: Products
hero.description: Consciously crafted collections for children and companion animals.

list.title: Kidswear
list.description: Wrap your little one in love, comfort, and culture. Our kidswear collection is made from breathable, naturally dyed cottons using traditional Indian textiles like Ajrakh, block prints, and hand‑woven fabrics. From rompers to dresses, every piece is gentle on delicate skin, stitched with care, and made to move freely through play and sleep.

list.title: Pet Wear
list.description: Our handcrafted pet wear blends comfort, durability, and cultural charm. Made with soft, toxin‑free Indian cottons and prints, each piece is lightweight, breathable, and easy to wear. Whether it’s a bandana, a collar, or a casual shirt, your pet stays cozy and stylish—while you support artisan livelihoods with every purchase.

list.title: Pet Beds
list.description: Every pet deserves a soft place to land. Our beds are filled with hypoallergenic stuffing and designed to support restful sleep. Sustainable, breathable, and built to last—just like the bond with your pet.

steps.title: Artisan Collaboration
steps.description: Partner with master craftspeople across India for authentic textiles.

steps.title: Sustainable Sourcing
steps.description: Natural fibres and safe dyes with full supply chain traceability.

steps.title: Ethical Manufacturing
steps.description: Small‑batch, transparent production with fair wages.

steps.title: Global Delivery
steps.description: Export‑ready quality control and reliable worldwide logistics.
